abilities.name: Bound Creation
abilities.rule: While this unit is in the same unit as a **CRYPTEK** model, that **CRYPTEK** model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Systematic Vigour
abilities.rule: Each time a **CRYPTOTHRALL** model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

unit_composition:

**Every model is equipped with:** scouring eye; scythed limbs.
